attributes.action: Review the Decommissioning terms of the Good Friday Agreement
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The FACT is that the IRA's Terrorist Plan (The Garland Plan see also Garlandplan petition) was published in the appendices to the Scarman Report in 1972.

The Blueprint planned FIVE terrorist weapons systems.  BOMB and BULLET (called the "Stunts" campaign) and POISON, INDUSTRIAL SABOTAGE and AGRICULTURAL SABOTAGE.

Tony BLAIR, in spite of his prime duty of Defence of the Realm, entered into a Peace Agreement without requiring declaration or decommissioning of THREE of the planned weapons systems (sabotage and poison)

Evidence has emerged that a sabotage campaign was instituted in UK (see petition about emergency backup generators called Garlandplan) but no inquiry has been authorized to determine the motive and political affiliations of the alleged perpetrator.
